name: WorldChooser
description:
Very short demo in which you create a world based on hard choices. This game is meant to simulate the choices a game developer makes when creating a game.

Made for the TriJam 3 hour game jam.

Theme: hard choices

Credits and info

{

Art made by Murkje

Code by Murkje

Music made with cgmusic (http://maciej.codeminion.com/2008/05/cgmusic-computers-create-music/) which is a random music generator

Pixel art made with Piskel

Menu art made with https://trianglify.io/

Engine: Unity

}
